game.engine.stage.scene.object

Class LabelObject

  • java.lang.Object
    • game.engine.stage.scene.object.SceneObject
      • game.engine.stage.scene.object.LabelObject
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    CachedLabelObject

    public class LabelObject
extends SceneObject
    A SceneObject that represents a label for displaying text.
    Author:
    Marvin Bruns

    • Method Detail

      • paint

        protected void paint(java.awt.Graphics2D g,
         long elapsedTime)
        Description copied from class: SceneObject
        Paint this SceneObject. This method maybe called for collision testing with an elapsed time of zero. For correct collision the SceneObject it is important, that the object is drawn in it's actual state.
        Specified by:
        paint in class SceneObject
        Parameters:
        g - Graphics Object for painting
        elapsedTime - Elapsed time since the last call to this method

      • setScaleStrategy

        public void setScaleStrategy(ScaleStrategy scaleStrategy)
        Set the used ScaleStrategy. If the scale strategy is not ScaleStrategy.NoScale the size of the Font is ignored.
        Parameters:
        scaleStrategy - The strategy, that will be used fore scaling the text
